Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
R E G I O N A L  A M E N I T I E S
• Beautifully maintained business park occupied by
prominent employers including UNC and CSU
• Medical Center of the Rockies, a regional hospital
and surrounding complex of supportive medical
office facilities
• The Promenade Shops and the Marketplace at
Centerra combine to make this one of Northern
Colorado’s largest retail centers
• Chapungu Sculpture Park
• Motoplex at Centerra
• Residential mix of homes, townhomes, condos and
apartments laced with walking and biking trails
• Enhanced with protected lakes, wetlands, open space

In Loveland, Colorado, a growing town just 50 miles north of Denver and 10 miles south of Fort Collins, this property sits in the center of the bustling retail, healthcare, restaurants, and residential area of town.
The space for lease features:
+ First Floor Location
+ Easy access to I-25
+ Showers in Restrooms
+ Open Floorplan
+ Outdoor Patio
+ Approximately 16,500 SF

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Second floor suite with elevator access
Easy access from Hwy 34 and I-25

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: This attractive suite is well located in the Centerra Business District, near the intersection of Rocky Mountain Avenue and McWhinney Blvd. in Loveland.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This professional office suite is situated near financial institutions, a regional hospital, shopping and dining. With a reception area, six private offices, a large open area and private restrooms, this suite is appealing and ready to occupy.

This Office building is currently occupied by Compass Bank, Amazing Care Home Health, JBP Law, and Fresenius Medical Care. The building provides its occupants with views of the mountains and is within one mile of over 25 restaurants, shopping, hotels and the UC Health Medical Center of the Rockies. It is located in the center of a master planned community which will continue to grow and develop in the  Northern Colorado region.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Highly Visible Office Building in Centerra Office Park

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Centerra Office Park near the I-25/Hwy 34 interchange

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
5250 Hahns Peak Drive, located in the heart of Northern Colorado at Centerra,
is 32,194 square foot office building constructed in 1999 and is occupied
by Employers Council, Aerotek Staffing, and Foundations Counseling. The
building is in a campus setting with two additional properties with similar
floor plans within walking distance. The property provides its occupants with
excellent views of the mountains, highly landscaped courtyards, and is within
one mile of over 25 restaurants, shopping, hotels, and Medical Center of the
Rockies.

Second Building of a two-building campus offering 106,000 square feet total.
Large floor plates, extremely competitive lease rates, 4.5/1,000 parking,
immediate access to I-25 and US Hwy 34 along with all the amenities Centerra
has to offer. On-site property management, redundant fiber optic infrastructure
in place. Top value in Northern Colorado for office space!

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Large Second Floor Space in HP II Available For Buildout

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in Centerra Office Park near the I-25/Hwy 34 interchange

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: First of a two-building campus offering 106,000 square feet. Extremely competitive lease rates, 4/1,000 parking, immediate access to I-25 and US Highway 34 along with all the amenities Centerra has to offer. On-site property management, redundant electrical service from two substations and fiber optic infrastructure. Top value in Northern Colorado for office space!

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Free Standing Building Adjacent to McKee Medical Campus

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
This offering is centrally located between Fort Collins
and Loveland, CO just a few blocks west of Highway
287 in the Colorado Commerce Center. I-25 is just 5
minutes away via E CR 30.
The property is conveniently located near the UPS
Distribution Center and Walmart Super Center

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
+ Suite 599: 3,275 SF Total
• 1,475 SF Office
• 1,800 SF Warehouse

+ Suite 595: Additional 1,500 SF of 2nd floor open office
for a total size of 4,775 SF
*Suite 595 not available separately

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Southeast corner off Highway 287 and 42nd Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Office suite for lease in north Loveland

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Building Space Signage and Monument signage

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: This office is highly visible from one of Loveland's main traffic corridors, Hwy 287. It also offers easy access to Highway 34.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Small office condo with a quiet atmosphere in a well maintained building. This condo offers a small office, a large open area, copier/workstation and private restroom. It also features a back entry with a screen door.

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: Main Level  N and S Units

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Large main floor and lower level space

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The property is well located in West Loveland along vibrant Hwy 34 at the busy Taft Avenue intersection.
It is situated next to the Village Inn Restaurant, across from Safeway, Verizon Wireless and 1st bank as well as Chipotle, Starbucks and Silver Mine Subs. It is highly visible and accessible from this major thoroughfare that connects I-25 to the Big Thompson Canyon. Monument signage is available.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
